languages.text: "Так точно. Кибермастиф в вашем распоряжении, Вольный Торговец. Только когда будете с ним общаться, не суйте пальцы в пасть. Откусит". {n}Кивнув, проктор покидает мостик.{/n}
"Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Так точно. Кибермастиф в вашем распоряжении, Вольный Торговец. Только когда будете с ним общаться, не суйте пальцы в пасть. Откусит". {n}Кивнув, проктор покидает мостик.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him. You wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

"Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

languages.text: «En efecto. Mi cibermastín está a su disposición, Comerciante. Pero mantenga las manos cerca del cuerpo cuando lo tenga cerca; no querrá perderlas». {n}Con un movimiento de cabeza a modo de despedida, Solomorne se marcha.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «En efecto. Mi cibermastín está a su disposición, Comerciante. Pero mantenga las manos cerca del cuerpo cuando lo tenga cerca; no querrá perderlas». {n}Con un movimiento de cabeza a modo de despedida, Solomorne se marcha.{/n}

languages.text: “没错，我的生化獒犬全权听从你的吩咐，行商浪人。不过，千万别把手放在离它太近的地方，相信你并不想失去手指。”{n}索罗蒙点了点头，离开了。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “没错，我的生化獒犬全权听从你的吩咐，行商浪人。不过，千万别把手放在离它太近的地方，相信你并不想失去手指。”{n}索罗蒙点了点头，离开了。{/n}

languages.text: « En effet. Mon cyber-mastiff est à votre disposition, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais surtout, faites bien attention à vos doigts, ce serait dommage de les perdre. » {n}Solomorne opine du chef avant de prendre congé.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « En effet. Mon cyber-mastiff est à votre disposition, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Mais surtout, faites bien attention à vos doigts, ce serait dommage de les perdre. » {n}Solomorne opine du chef avant de prendre congé.{/n}

languages.text: 「ああ。ローグトレーダー、私のサイバーマスチフは自由に使ってください。ただし、彼の周りでは触れないように気をつけた方がいいです。指を失いたくはないでしょう」{n}ソロモーンはうなずくと、出て行く。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「ああ。ローグトレーダー、私のサイバーマスチフは自由に使ってください。ただし、彼の周りでは触れないように気をつけた方がいいです。指を失いたくはないでしょう」{n}ソロモーンはうなずくと、出て行く。{/n}

languages.text: "Aynen öyle. Siber mastifim hizmetinizdedir Hür Tacir. Yalnız onun yanındayken parmaklarınızı sağa sola uzatmayın, kaybedersiniz sonra." {n}Solomorne, başını sallayıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Aynen öyle. Siber mastifim hizmetinizdedir Hür Tacir. Yalnız onun yanındayken parmaklarınızı sağa sola uzatmayın, kaybedersiniz sonra." {n}Solomorne, başını sallayıp ortamdan ayrılıyor.{/n}

languages.text: "In der Tat. Mein Cyber-Mastiff steht Euch zur Verfügung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Achtet in seiner Gegenwart nur auf Eure Finger ... es sei denn, Ihr wollt sie verlieren." {n}Solomorne wendet sich mit einem Nicken zum Gehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Indeed. My cyber-mastiff is at your disposal, Rogue Trader. Just keep your fingers to yourself around him — you wouldn't want to lose them." {n}With a nod, Solomorne takes his leave.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "In der Tat. Mein Cyber-Mastiff steht Euch zur Verfügung, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Achtet in seiner Gegenwart nur auf Eure Finger ... es sei denn, Ihr wollt sie verlieren." {n}Solomorne wendet sich mit einem Nicken zum Gehen.{/n}
